meanings.definition: A person who edits written material for publication.
meanings.sent1: The editor carefully checked for any mistakes in the article.
meanings.sent2: The editor made sure the book was ready to be printed.
meanings.sent3: The editor found a funny typo in the story and fixed it.
meanings.sent4: She was like an editor of life, making sure everything was in order.
meanings.sent5: The editor's red pen marked all the errors in the document.

meanings.definition: A program or software used for editing text or images.
meanings.sent1: I used the editor to crop the photo and adjust the colors.
meanings.sent2: The editor allowed me to change the font and size of the text.
meanings.sent3: The editor decided to randomly delete all the vowels in the text.
meanings.sent4: The editor was a magic wand, transforming the image with a click.
meanings.sent5: With the editor, I could make the picture look like a painting.
